body_html: Apart from rebuilding with py2, another painful point is that the linter script will always lint all thousands of python sources, despite the "--incremental" option (which is explicitly not used by the linter).
body_text: Apart from rebuilding with py2, another painful point is that the linter script will always lint all thousands of python sources, despite the "--incremental" option (which is explicitly not used by the linter).
body: Apart from rebuilding with py2, another painful point is that the linter script will always lint all thousands of python sources, despite the "--incremental" option (which is explicitly not used by the linter).
